content: october hat a free pattern by sloane rosenthal kelbourne woolens year of hats october hat sloane rosenthal specifications worthy of note yarn the october hat is worked in the round from the bottom kelbourne woolens germantown 100% n american up the hat begins with a provisional cast on and then a wool 220 yds/100 gm skein oxford blue 419 1 skein deep knit 2 purl 2 ribbing is worked an
